titles.title: Data Analyst Intern
description: Develop, deploy, and maintain ad-hoc and weekly reports regarding account and donation data
Analyze and present tabular data in a meaningful and readily accessible manner for senior team
Demonstrate excellent communication abilities in in-person and remote environments to meet reporting requests and deadline needs in a timely manner
Improve completion time and distribution of reports through the use and understanding of Excel Power Query
Supervise and train new interns, ensuring that the quality of reports are met

titles.title: Customer Service Representative
description: Familiarity with financial transactions and PII (Personally Identifiable Information) protocols
Demonstrated the ability to analyze diverse situations and identify unique customer issues and needs
Confidently communicated accurate information and solutions with a positive attitude
Collaborated with upper management and customer service team to ensure customer satisfaction is maintained
